item.title: Bank Of Baroda Stock Hits All-Time High, Marking a Significant Milestone
item.description: Bank Of Baroda has reached a significant milestone by hitting its all-time high, reflecting a sustained period of strong performance and market confidence. The stock’s recent surge underscores the company’s robust fundamentals and its prominent position within the public sector banking industry. Time: 12 minutes ago

item.title: Jindal Saw Ltd Hits Intraday High with 7.23% Surge on 25 Feb 2026
item.description: Jindal Saw Ltd recorded a robust intraday performance on 25 Feb 2026, surging to a day’s high of Rs 188.85, marking a significant 7.45% increase. This sharp rise outpaced the broader Iron & Steel Products sector and reversed a two-day downward trend, reflecting notable trading momentum in the stock. Time: 17 minutes ago

item.title: Angel One Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Technical Signals
item.description: Angel One Ltd, a key player in the capital markets sector, witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite a modest price gain, the stock remains under pressure from broader technical indicators and a recent downgrade in its mojo grade, raising questions about the sustainability of this momentum. Time: 18 minutes ago

item.title: Eternal Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amidst Weak Price Momentum

item.title: Prestige Estates Sees Sharp Open Interest Rise Amid Bearish Momentum
